title: Penta datacard on lobbyfacts.eu
author: unknown
text:
Overview Lobbying Costs 3,775,000€ Financial year: Jan 2024 - Dec 2024 Lobbyists (Full time equivalent) 27.75 Fte (31) Lobbyists with EP accreditation 0 High-level Commission meetings 38 Lobbying Costs over the years 
					 Info
					 Penta EU Transparency Register 3843982938-44 First registered on 07 Jan 2009 Goals / Remit Penta is the world's first comprehensive stakeholder solutions firm. We work with our clients to define, inform and strengthen decision-making and understanding between businesses and their stakeholders. Main EU files targeted Penta works with a range of clients including trade associations, companies and coalitions of organisations on the below EU policy areas and associated policies. Energy and climate policies: EU ETS, CBAM, RED II / III, EPBD, Electricity Regulation / Directive, TEN-E, PCIs, Green Claims Directive, Carbon Removals Certification Framework, EUDR, Energy Efficiency Directive Environment policies: AAQD, NEC Directive, PPWR, Industrial Emissions Directive, REACH, Critical Raw Materials Act, Circular Economy Act, ESPR, Waste Framework Directive, Textile Labelling Regulation Transport and mobility policies: airport charges, air passenger rights, CEF, Eurovignette, sustainable aviation fuels, Single European Sky, slots regulation, alternative infrastructure charging, CO2 for passenger cars and heavy duty vehicles, aviation policy Food and agriculture policies: Farm to Fork, food labelling, plant protection, sustainable use of pesticides, new genomic techniques, soil, biodiversity, protection of animals used for scientific purposes, animal welfare, CAP, LULUCF, deforestation, food contact, alcohol policy, organics policy, retail policy Financial services policies: sustainable finance, CSRD, CSDDD, ESG, crypto assets, MiFID, MiFIR, EMIR, DORA, Green Bonds, IRRD, IFR/D, IRRD, CRD/R, UCITS, ESAP, AiFMD, BMR, AML, MiCA, Solvency II, taxation, ELTIF, RIS, MMF, CSDR, digital euro, SFDR, Taxonomy, ESG ratings, ESG data, and greenwashing Digital policies: DSA, DMA, AI, infrastructure, spectrum, space Trade and industrial policies: FTAs with third countries, customs code, excise duty, sustainable value and supply chains. Address Head Office 805, 15th St NW 2nd floor Washington DC 20005 UNITED STATES EU Office 41 Rue de la Science Brussels 1040 BELGIUM Website

					 EU Structures
					 Groups (European Commission) None declared Groups (European Parliament) N/A Communication activities As a thought leading consultancy we organise regular events on our own behalf and for our clients, and publish regular briefings and updates. See www.pentagroup.com. Penta Policy Insiders, the research arm of Penta, carries out surveys and information gathering activities related to EU policies and EU policy making. Other activities None declared Meetings
					 Meetings 38 meetings found. Download meetings The list below covers meetings with Commissioners/Cabinet members/Directors-general (high-level) Commission meetings published December 2014 to December 2024, and the meetings of Commissioners/Cabinet members/Directors-general and officials holding "management functions" in the Commission published since 1 January 2025. Other lobby meetings with lower-level staff may well have taken place, but the Commission doesn't proactively publish information about these meetings. All information below comes from the Commission and not from the registrant. 1 July 2024: We have noted that some meetings are appearing in duplicate, ie. some meetings seem to be listed twice. This seems to be because the Commission changes some element of a meeting data after the meeting has first been listed, which causes LobbyFacts to register it as a new meeting. We are investigating further.
